public class ControlAppender
extends ch.qos.logback.core.AppenderBase<ch.qos.logback.classic.spi.ILoggingEvent>

Appender for everything thats not bot. All events from Bot are ignored

Author:
Leon Blakey

append

public void append(ch.qos.logback.classic.spi.ILoggingEvent event)
Used by Log4j to write something from the LoggingEvent. This simply points to WriteOutput which writes to the the GUI or to the console
